<title level="1" right="Rules">[Armor Specialization Effects](/Rules.aspx?ID=2179)</title>

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 272 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Certain class features can grant you additional benefits with certain armors. This is called an armor specialization effect. The exact effect depends on which armor group your armor belongs to, as [listed here.](ArmorGroups.aspx)
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
